concept.title: WHAT IS THE SUBTRACTION OF NUMBERS
concept.shortdesc: HERE YOU WILL LEARN WHAT IS SUBTRACTION

conbody.p: TO SUCCESFULLY PERFORM THE TASK OF SUBTRACTING NUMBERS , YOU MUST KNOW WHAT IS SUBTRACTION. THE TERM "SUBTRACTION" REPRESENTS A MATHMATICAL OPERATION. SUBTRACTION ALLOWS YOU TO FIND THE DIFFERENCE OF TWO NUMBERS.
YOU USE THE (-) MINUS BUTTON TO EXPRESS THE SUBTRACTION OPERATION IN THE APP.
IN SUBTRACTION, YOU TAKE A NUMBER AND REDUCE IT TO A SMALLER NUMBER. THAT IS, TAKE AWAY THE SMALLER NUMBER FROM THE LARGER.
